lead_paragraph: The Skins Game rookie Stephen Ames rolled in a 3-foot birdie putt on the third playoff hole yesterday for $270,000 and a winning total of $590,000 in La Quinta, Calif. Fred Couples, who has won the Skins Game five times in 13 appearances, finished second with $385,000.
